anyOf.description: Represents a rotation axis with intervals and maxes. The x and z axis values are defaulted to disabled. The Y axis defaults to on, rotating by 90 degree increments.

enabled.description:
enabled
Should this axis be rotated at all?
   
Boolean

    
* Default Value is a default object (create this object to see default properties)

min.description:
min
The minimum angle (from) or set this and max to zero for any angle degrees. Set both to the same non-zero value to force it to that angle only
   
Number

    
* Default Value is 0.0
* Minimum allowed is -360.0
* Maximum allowed is 360.0

max.description:
max
The maximum angle (to) or set this and min to zero for any angle degrees. Set both to the same non-zero value to force it to that angle only
   
Number

    
* Default Value is 0.0
* Minimum allowed is -360.0
* Maximum allowed is 360.0

interval.description:
interval
Iris spins the axis but not freely. For example an interval of 90 would mean 4 possible angles (right angles) degrees. 
Setting this to 0 means totally free rotation.

Note that a lot of structures can have issues with non 90 degree intervals because the minecraft block resolution is so low.
   
Number

    
* Default Value is 0.0
* Minimum allowed is 0.0
* Maximum allowed is 360.0
